pullRequest.title: [Feature][Meta]Update/Read/Write VisibleVersionTime for Partition#4076
pullRequest.bodyText:
#4076

The visibleVersionTime is updated when insert data to partition
GlobalTransactionMgr call partition.updateVisibleVersionAndVersionHash(version, versionHash) when fe is restarted
If fe restart, VisibleVersionTime may be changed, but the changed value is newer than the old value

nodes.bodyText: If you do not persist the visibleVersionTime in edit log, than write it here is meaningless.

commit.message: PartitoinCommitInfo uses gson for serialization and deserialization
